subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Penn State christened its $90 million Pegula Ice Arena with a 4-1 victory over Army on Friday night before an overflow crowd announced at 6,370.
snippet: Penn State christened its $90 million Pegula Ice Arena with a 4-1 victory over Army on Friday night before an overflow crowd announced at 6,370.
